Added interface react.Closeable.

Removed Methods
TaskHandle addTask(Task) Adds a task that will henceforth be updated once per game update.
Animator animator() Returns an animator that can be used within the scope of this interface.
void deferAction(Runnable) Posts a runnable that will be executed after the next time the interface is validated.
boolean destroyRoot(Root) Removes the supplied root element from this interface and destroys its layer, iff it's currently added.
void destroyRoots() Removes and destroys all roots in this interface.
void paint(Clock) "Paints" the elements in this interface.

boolean disposeRoot(Root) Removes the supplied root element from this interface and disposes its layer, iff it's currently added.
void disposeRoots() Removes and disposes all roots in this interface.

 Creates a root element with the specified layout and stylesheet and adds its layer to the specified parent.
